name: A Bus Ride
description:
John is taking a bus across the country when something strange happens. He and his fellow passengers try to make sense of it in their own way but John is left feeling there is no real answer at all.

HEADPHONES REQUIRED

A Bus Ride is a submission to SCREAMJAM 2018, and was made in <7 days. It was based on a story idea I had that I wasn't sure how to flesh out fully. I hope you enjoyed it and be sure to check out the other entries to SCREAMJAM 2018 here:

https://itch.io/jam/screamjam/entries
